item.title: Disco Narrator - Data Scraping
item.author: 152334H
item.description:
To train an AI Text-To-Speech (TTS) model, we’ll need to obtain a Labelled Dataset with two things:

  1. Clean audio files (.wavs), containing only the voice we’re cloning
  2. The dialogue transcript (text) for each audio file

item.title: The making of: Disco Narrator
item.author: 152334H
item.description: How I made a Text-to-Speech (TTS) model for (some of) a video game’s characters.
